DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Pre-analytical Variables Program Tissue Processing Clearing Agent Duration Follow Standard Operating Procedure Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of whether the duration in clearing agent follows that prescribed in the BPV FFPE Tissue Processing SOP.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Pre-analytical Variables Program Tissue Processing Clearing Agent Duration Follow Standard Operating Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A program designed to systematically investigate the effects of individual pre-analytical factors on the molecular profiles of biospecimens. The results of this study will be used to develop evidence-based protocols and best practices for optimal collection, processing, and storage of biospecimens._Cleaning and preparation of tissues for further use in biological products._Any substance that is administered to facilitate the removal of another substance._The period of time during which something continues._Adhere to or practice._An established procedure to be followed in carrying out a given operation or in a given situation.

The results of this study will be used to develop evidence-based protocols and best practices for optimal collection, processing, and storage of biospecimens.:Cleaning and preparation of tissues for further use in biological products.

Concepts.definition: A program designed to systematically investigate the effects of individual pre-analytical factors on the molecular profiles of biospecimens. The results of this study will be used to develop evidence-based protocols and best practices for optimal collection, processing, and storage of biospecimens.
Cleaning and preparation of tissues for further use in biological products.
